definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: Thee cool rain, cool thin fleeting.

sentences.chinese: 陣陣春雨帶來百花滿園。

sentences.english: He will come to us like the winter rains, like the spring rains that water the earth.
sentences.chinese: 他會來到我們身邊，正如冬雨和春雨會沐浴大地。

sentences.english: Spring rains and warm sunlight quickened the earth.
sentences.chinese: 春雨和溫暖的陽光使大地復甦了。

sentences.english: The spring breeze blew the green Eastern divine land, the spring rain has moistened the China native place.
sentences.chinese: 春風啊吹綠了東方神州，春雨啊滋潤了華夏故園。

sentences.english: Spring grain gradually break, after the rain of the campus, every corner are water moistens.
sentences.chinese: 春雨漸歇，雨後的校園，每一個角落都被春水滋潤着。

sentences.english: After spring rain, colorful flowers bloomed all over the mountain. ?
sentences.chinese: 春雨過後，滿山遍野都開着五顏六色的花朵。

sentences.english: Pottery-making schools spring up like bamboo shoots after a spring rain.
sentences.chinese: 春天像製陶學校竹筍一場春雨過後。

sentences.english: The air emitting a fragrance of spring.
sentences.chinese: 空氣中散發出春雨的芬芳。

sentences.english: The spring rain is soaking into the fields.
After a light spring rain, leaves began to sprout from tress.
sentences.chinese: 一場小小的春雨後，樹木開始冒出新芽。

sentences.english: I am the gentle shower of rain, on Westfall's fields of golden grain.
sentences.chinese: 我是溫柔的春雨，滋潤着西部荒野的麥田。

sentences.english: The rain in spring brings us summer flowers.
sentences.chinese: 春雨爲我們帶來了夏日的百花。

sentences.english: In that the sweet spring rain, buds grow gradually moist leaves green.
sentences.chinese: 在那甘甜的春雨滋潤下，芽漸漸長成綠綠的葉。

sentences.english: The air smelled like spring rain.
sentences.chinese: 空氣中迷漫着春雨的氣息。

definition: fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
